[83:6] a day when (yawma is a substitution for the [syntactical] locus of li-yawmin, ‘to an [awful] day’, and as such is in the accusative because of [the verb] mab‘ūthūna, ‘will be resurrected’) mankind will rise, from their graves, before the Lord of the Worlds?, [the Lord of] all creatures, for His affair, His reckoning and His requital.

(The day when (all) mankind stand) after emerging from the graves (before the Lord of the Worlds) the Lord of every living being who walks on the earth and the Lord of the dwellers of heaven? When the Prophet (pbuh) read to them this surah, they repented and started giving full weight and measurement.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ } بأجمعهم
 لأجل العرض { لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَالَمِينَ } [المطففين: 6] ليحكم عليهم سبحانه على مقتضى السؤال والحساب
 إمَّا بالجنة وإمَّا بالنار
